sentences.english: The white waves ripple in the Hulan River.
The old Hulan River flows gently on an autumn morning.
sentences.chinese: 秋日的清晨，古老的呼兰河水流过原野。

sentences.english: Hulan is the earliest open region of Qin Dynasty in the northeast China.
sentences.chinese: 呼兰是清政府在东北最早开禁的地区。
